alert.note: Alert for Coastal Brunswick; Coastal New Hanover; Inland Brunswick; Inland New Hanover (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 22 at 4:17PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central New Hanover and southeastern Brunswick Counties through 445 PM EDT... At 417 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over St. James, or near Oak Island, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Wilmington, Oak Island, Carolina Beach, Wrightsville Beach, Kure Beach, Caswell Beach, Bald Head Island, South Masonboro Island, Johnny Mercer Pier, Snows Cut, Ocean Crest Pier, Figure Eight Island, Yaupon Beach, North Masonboro Island, Boiling Spring Lakes, St. James, Southport, Supply, Brunswick County Community College Main Campus and Myrtle Grove. This includes US Route 17 in Brunswick County between mile markers 22 and 36. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Brunswick; Coastal New Hanover; Inland Brunswick; Inland New Hanover
